extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.3.7 - Nov. 21, 2021[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added a new "aliases_check" method to correct some bad alias strings returned from Trakt. Known cases are the original show [B]"Dexter"[/B] Trakt returns [B]"Dexter: New Blood"[/B], [B]"Titans"[/B] Trakt returns [B]"Teen Titans"[/B]. In both cases these are NOT the same shows so the title check would allow them returned in the scrape results. This fixes that problem.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added a new custom query scrape method. This can be found in the [B]"Rescrape Options"[/B] context menu. This will allow you to over-ride ex. [B]"Dexter: New Blood S01E01"[/B] with [B]"Dexter S09E01"[/B]. Movies allows for a Title and Year change, while Episodes allows for a Title, Season, and Episode change. Please do not abuse this flipping to a completely different title as the intent is only to scrape for scene release title variations for the same Movie, TV Show title.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed settings issue where Trakt resume source duplicate setting would show for both Trakt auth and non Trakt users. Now only one will show for either condition.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added [B]Priority[/B] setting for Direct Premium account links to be able to prioritize with [B]"AD, PM, and RD"[/B]. Now you can have for ex. [B] Easy News[/B] links appear before debrid links.[/I]
